name: Jack of All Trades (itch)
description:
Overview

Jack woke up one day in an unknown world. With no way back home and needing to find a way to survive in this new world, our entrepreneur decides to set up a shop in this new world to make some money and hopefully gather some information at the same time.

Controls

Move around using Floating Joysticks

Mechanics

Check what item(s) each customer wants and move to the respective area to get the item. Some items may need processing. Deliver the item(s) in time and customers will pay you. Use the money you earn to upgrade the shop and earn even more money.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project Jack of All Trades was developed over the span of 6 weeks as part of my "Mobile Game Development" Module

Check out this video for gameplay of the game
